trade_info.position_pnl_info: Shows your total gain after deducting all fees and costs from a closed trade. It reflects the actual amount of money you earned or lost.
trade_info.realised_pnl_info: Shows the total realized gain or loss from a closed trade. It's calculated as (exit price - entry price) × position size, representing your final profit or loss.
trade_info.total_funding_info: Total Funding shows the cumulative funding fees paid or received for holding a perpetual position. It’s calculated as (total open positions × funding rate) and can be positive (paid) or negative (received).
trade_info.approx_entry_amount_info: Reflects the actual capital used for your position after deducting fees
trade_info.not_exact_values_description: We use the values that Bingx provides for his API, these values are approximations and may not match the exact values shown in your account

common_messages.are_your_sure_want_to_delete: Are you sure you want to delete
common_messages.be_carefull: Please be carefull, this operation can not be rolled back.

errors.incorrect_api_key_error_description: Please check your API key and try again.

statistics.net_pnl_info: The total profit or loss after fees and comissions have been deducted. It represents the actual gain or loss from trading activities.
statistics.profit_factor_info: A metric that measures the profitability of a trading strategy by dividing total gains by total losses. A value above 1 indicates a profitable strategy, while below 1 suggests losses outweigh gains.
statistics.trade_win_percentage_info: The percentage of winning trades out of the total number of trades executed. It indicates how often a trader’s strategy results in profitable outcomes.
statistics.avg_win_loss_info: The average gain from winning trades and the average loss from losing trades. It helps assess the typical size of profits versus losses per trade.
statistics.please_select_account_to_fetch_data: Please select an account to fetch data.

open_positions.open_positions_description: currently open positions, these don't depend on the time range

trades.description: You can see all your trades closed

accounts.name: Name
accounts.account_error_message: An error occurred while saving the account
accounts.account_sync_trades_descriptions: If the account ID associated with this account is not already registered, we will sync all your closed postions based on your filled positions based on your the last 30 days. This may take a while
accounts.create_api_key_info: Don't you know how to create an API key? Follow this <link>guide</link> to learn how to create an API key.

create_key_tutorial.log_into_bingx_description: Access your <link>Bingx Account</link> and verify that your account meets all requirements for API access.
create_key_tutorial.go_to_api_managment_description: Find the 'API Management' tab in your account settings.
create_key_tutorial.config_and_create_your_api_key: Configure and create your API key
create_key_tutorial.only_read_permission_needed: Only the read permission is needed
create_key_tutorial.add_ip_whitelisting: Add IP Whitelisting, you can use a page like <link>this</link> to get the ip based on the domain.
create_key_tutorial.complete_verification_steps_to_continue: Complete the verification steps to continue
create_key_tutorial.copy_api_and_secret_key_description: Save the API and Secret Key in a secure location. Make sure to save them in this phase, if you don't do it now, you will not be able to get your secret key again.

ai_summary.description: Get your weekly summary powered by AI
ai_summary.no_week_data_to_summarize_description: This last summarize is based in your last week data. It seems that you haven't used the platform in the last week.
